#summary Describes the Comment class and its methods

=Comment=
==Constructor==
{{{
Comment(coord_x, coord_y, text)
}}}
where:

    _coord_x_ = x position of the box; 

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box; 

    _text_ = defines content of the comment;

==Methods==
===Edit===
edits the content of the comment
{{{
edit(new_text)
}}}
where:
    new_text = new content of the comment;
